content:
ServiceBusConnectionStringBuilder ServiceBusConnectionStringBuilder Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.NotificationHubs
Assembly:
Microsoft.Notifications.dll

This class can be used to construct a connection string to be used in creating messaging client entities. It can also be used to perform basic validation on an existing connection string.

Edit

In this Article

Endpoints Endpoints

Edit

Gets the collection of service endpoint. Each endpoint must reference the same ServiceBus namespace.

public int ManagementPort { get; set; }Public Property ManagementPort As Integer

Int32 Int32

Remarks

This is only used in server scenario. When generating connection string for azure service, this should be left at its default value;.
